Susana enjoys petty trading very much. She runs a provision store to help her husband take of the family. She procures her goods from nearby markets at wholesale prices. She says her shop is situated at the local market square. Susana has been in business for thirteen years. It has been her desire to make savings enough to pay for her children to have the best education. She wants a loan to procure provisions in bulk so she can maximize her profit.

loans.use: To procure provisions for re-sale

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
la Sra, Maura L. tiene 47 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Laure abajo del municipio de San Lorenzo desde hace 46 años y se encuentra en union libre.
actualmente tiene dos hijos a su cargo de los cuales una de ellas estudia en la escuales de la aldea de donde ellos residen.
La Sra, L. se dedica a la venta de golosinas como ser tacos, enchiladas, tortillas con quesillo en las mañanas y luego en las tardes tiene su chiclera en la cual vende varios productos como ser galletas, refrescos, chicles, confites, gelatinas etc. con esta actividad ella ha logrado sostener a su familia y por ende mejorar un poco sus condiciones de vida, pero ahora ha decidido ampliar su negocio a traves de ropa usada, por tal razon ella necesita el credito para poder comprar fardos de ropa usada traida de Estados Unidos, ella ha realizado un estudio de que esta ropa se vende muy bien y ve factible poner un negocio de este tipo en su comunidad. para ella vender sus golosinas tiene que ir a varios lugares como ser campos de futbol, casas de la comunidad, mientras que con la venta de ropa lo haria en su casa de habitacion y asi podria atender la chiclera y tambien cuidar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maura L. is 47 years old and has lived in the Laure community, below the San Lorenzo municipality, for the past 46 years. Currently, she has two children in her care, one attending the schools of the town where they live. Mrs. L. dedicates herself to the sale of snacks such as tacos, enchiladas, and tortillas with cheese in the mornings. In the afternoons, she sells various products such as cookies, soft drinks, gum, candies, etc. With these activities she has managed to support her family, and improve their standard of living little by little. However, she has now decided to expand her business through used clothing. This is the reason she needs the loan, so she can buy used clothing brought from the United States. She has realized a study that this clothing will sell very well, and she sees the possibility in opening this type of business in her community. To sell her snacks, she has to travel to soccer fields and individual homes, whereas she could run the clothing business out of her home and that way tend to her snack shop and care for her children simultaneously.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase goods such as beverages, corn, cabbage, tomatoes, pastas, meats, wood, tortillas, salt,  churros, cookies.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia Q. is twenty-eight years old. She is married and has given birth to two children, a boy and a girl. According to Sophia, her two children are in the basic school. She says her husband trades in raw gold and products made of it. She lives with her family in a rented apartment in a small town called Simpa, a farming community which is a few kilometers from Tarkwa in the Western Region of Ghana.

Sophia works as a petty trader to help her husband meet the demands of the family. She deals in cereals such as maize, rice, beans, etc.; she travels from her town in the south all the way to the north to procure goods. Sophia says she distributes to food vendors in her community and also treks to markets in nearby towns to do business. She has been in this business for five years. Sophia wants a loan to be able to procure goods in bulk at each trip so she can save herself from making frequent trips to procure goods. She hopes to save enough to invest in her children’s education.

loans.use: To buy more cereals for re-sale

loans.name: Alma Rosa

texts.es:
No hace mucho el esposo de Alma ha iniciado un negocio. En la provincia de Chincha, acaba de construir una cancha de gras sintético para alquilarlo a diferentes clientes cuando deseen practicar algún deporte, en especial el futbol. Viendo la oportunidad de instalar un puesto de comida, Alma no dudo en empezar a preparar comida para venderla a aquellas familias o grupos de amigos que iban a usar la cancha.
Hoy ya lleva solo dos meses en este negocio pero tiene muchas expectativas. Más adelante esta planeando construir un pequeño restaurante en el mismo lugar.
Por otro lado, desde hace un año,  también se dedica a la confección de aretes, pulseras y collares. También ha trabajado anteriormente, en una fabrica textil por varios años, al cual renuncio ya que la fábrica se mudo a un distrito lejos de su hogar. No obstante, cuando tiene libre presta sus servicios ya que siempre es bueno contar con un ingreso adicional de dinero.
texts.en:
It has not been too long ago that Alma’s husband started a new business. He just finished building an artificial turf field in the Chincha province that he can rent out to different customers when they want to practice any type of sport, particularly soccer. Seeing the opportunity for a food stand, Alma had no doubt about starting to prepare food and sell it to the families or groups of friends that came to use the field. Currently, she has only been working at this business for two months but she has great expectations for it. Her future plans include building a small restaurant at the same location. On the other hand, for about a year now, she has also dedicated herself to making earrings, bracelets, and necklaces. Previously, she worked at a textile mill for several years, but she had to resign when the factory moved to a distant district that was too far from her home. Regardless, when she has free time, she lends her services since it is always good to have additional sources of income.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Materials for embroidery and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary M. produces palm oil on a large scale and distributes to customers buying in bulk and retail. Mary says she buys the palm nuts from farmers in her community and surrounding villages. Mary’s husband is a coco nut/cocoa farmer. She is forty– five years old, married with six children – three males and three females. She says four of them have completed junior high school and are learning trades. The last two are still in school. She lives with her family in a small town called Asaman, a farming/commercial town in the Western Region of Ghana.   

She wants a loan to procure palm fruits in bulk to distribute to her increasing number of customers. It is her desire to  give her two youngest children the best education.

loans.use: To buy palm nuts in bulk

loans.name: Cynthia Milagros,

texts.es:
Con solo veintiún años, Cynthia tiene muchos planes para su futuro. Cuando termino el colegio estudio la carrera técnica de masoterapia. Gracias a ello ha conseguido un trabajo en un centro comercial grande donde ofrece el servicio de masajes a los diferentes comerciantes de dicho centro.
Por su parte también hace masajes a quienes la conocen, amigos familiares y a personas recomendadas por ellos. Mas adelante ella quisiera independizarse y tener una empresa propia donde pueda ofrecer sus conocimientos a un numero mucho mas grande de clientes.
Por ahora, parte de sus ganancias las ahora y una fracción mas pequeña la destina para sus gastos personas. Cynthia es soltera y no tiene hijos.
texts.en:
Only 21 years old, Cynthia has many plans for the future. When she graduated from high school she studied massage-therapy. Thanks to this, she was able to get work in a large shopping centre where they offer massages to the merchants of the centre. She also offers massages to those she knows, friends, family and people recommended to her. In the future, she would like to become independent and own her own business where she could offer her services to many more clients. For now, she saves part of her income and uses a much smaller portion for her personal needs. Cynthia is single and has no children.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a machine for massages

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lilia Magaly,

texts.es:
Lilia es madre de tres hijos, uno de dieciséis, el segundo de catorce y el último de ocho años.  Siempre se ha dedicado al cuidado de ellos y al mantenimiento de su hogar. Hace un año su esposo era el único que llevaba el dinero  a casa. No obstante, en ese tiempo un grupo de amigas la animaron a formar un grupo de préstamos para poder invertir cada una en un negocio en particular.
Ella accede a empezar con el negocio de venta de ropa bajo pedido. Hoy ya lleva un año con la venta de diferentes prendas de vestir. Ahora su único deseo es poder crecer con la cantidad de mercadería para poder abrir una tienda en el futuro. Es por ello que sus ganancias las vuelve a reinvertir en compra de ropa.
texts.en:
Lilia has three children: 16, 14 and 8 years old. She has always dedicated herself to their care and to the care of her home. A year ago, only her husband was bringing an income into the household. Since then, a group of friends encouraged her to form a lending group so that each could invest in their business. She began by selling clothing on demand. For a year now she has been selling clothing of various sorts. Today her only wish is to increase the amount of merchandise she has so that she can open a proper store in the future. Because of this, she reinvests her profits in the purchase of more clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more merchandise to retail

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: El Esfuerzo Group

texts.es:
Este es el grupo el Esfuerzo el cual esta integrado por 3 mujeres muy luchadores, responsables y con muchos deseos de superarse, en este grupo se realizan varias actividades las cuales las detallamos a continuacion:
la Sra. Santos A. tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 1 ya se graduo del colegio y dos de ellos se encuentran estudiando, ella es muy conocida en su barrio por ser una persona muy amable y con buen trato a sus clientes ya que tiene una pulperia desde hace 4 años ubicada en el barrio Morazan de la ciudad de Nacaome.
La Sra, Rosibel A. tiene 25 años de edad y se encuentra en union libre. tiene un hijo pequeño y le ayuda a su abulea economicamente, ella tiene una venta de golosinas y refrescos de botella tambien en el barrio Morazan. 
La Sra. Norma M. tiene 35 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales dos de ellos le ayudan en la venta de tortillas, ella tiene 10 años de realizar esta actividad y tiene muchos clientes los cuales les aprecian mucho, ella tambien se traslada al mercado principal para vender su producto.
todas ellas necesitan el credito para poder sacar adelante sus negocios.
texts.en:
This is the "El Esfuerzo" group which is made up of three hardworking and responsible women who have a strong desire to better their lives. This group is active in a number of businesses: Santos A. is 40 years old, married and has four children of whom one has graduated from high school and two are still studying. She is very well known in her neighbourhood as a kind person who treats her customers well. She has had a grocery store for the past four years in the neighbourhood of Morazan in the city of Nacaome. Rosibel A. is 25 years old and is living common-law. She has a young son who helps her when she sells in the streets. She sell candies and bottled refreshments, also in the neighbourhood of Morazan. Norma M. is 35 years old and has four children, two of whom help her selling tortillas. She has been in this business for 10 years and has many clients who all appreciate her very much. She also sells her products in the main market. These three ladies need a loan in order to better their businesses.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood, meat, potato, cabbage, beans, rice, sugar, coffee, bread, cookies, oil, salt, butter, soft cheese

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Abena O. sells fried fish to make some income. She buys fresh fish from coastal areas and fries it herself. Abena supplies fried fish mostly to food vendors in her community.  Food vendors find it more convenient and affordable to buy fried fish than frying it themselves. She aspires to own a fridge to store her procured fresh fish. She has been in business for eight years. Abena wants a loan to procure fresh fish in bulk so she can distribute to more customers.
 
She is forty– three years old, married with six children- two girls and four boys. The eldest is learning a trade, one is a senior in high school and four are in the junior high and basic schools. Her husband is a rubber tapper.  Abena lives with her family in a small town called Asaman, a farming/commercial town in the Western Region of Ghana.

loans.use: To buy fresh fish

loans.name: Socorro

texts.es:
Desde hace ocho meses Socorro se dedica a la venta de limones al por mayor, distribuyéndolos en diferentes mercados de su localidad  También desde hace un buen tiempo vende comida por pensión. Ella prepara determinados números de platos y los reparte a sus clientes que, por lo general, trabajan como obreros en alguna empresa.
Antes de estos dos trabajos ella se dedicaba a la venta de pescado en un puesto ambulante. Este negocio lo tuvo por el tiempo de dos años, hasta que se animó a vender limones, ya que el precio de los mariscos aumentó. 
En estos días está pensado vender ropa según los pedidos que le hagan amigos, familiares y conocidos de estos. Más delante quisiera abrir un negocio más estable en su casa, tal vez una bodega.
Socorro tiene cinco hijos, pero ya cuatro de ellos son independientes y la ayudan con los gasto de la casa, pues Socorro es viuda desde hace unos años.
texts.en:
For eight months, Socorro has been selling wholesale lemons, distributing them at various markets throughout her area. She has also been selling meals for quite some time. She prepares a certain number of meals and gives them to her customers, who generally work for some company.

Before getting involved in these activities, she used to sell fish as a street vendor. She was in business for two years, until she decided to sell lemons because seafood prices increased.

She is now thinking about selling custom order apparel to her family, friends and acquaintances. In the future, she would also like to start a more stable business from home, or perhaps in a store.

Socorro has five children who are all independent and help her with the household expenses because she has been a widow for a few years.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase lemons and apparel

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El Sr. Carlos Ramón Báez es de la compañia Calixtro de la ciudad de Carapeguá, esta casado con la Sra. Nancy Victoria Ayala, se dedica a la compra y faenamiento de animales vacunos para la su comercialización en  negocios de la zona, actividad que realiza hace varios años y del cual obtiene los ingresos para la mantención de su familia.
     Actualmente tienen dos hijos menores, cuenta con casa propia con todas las comodidades que según manifestaron los clientes consiguieron construirla gracias al sacrificio y a la dedicación puesta en su trabajo.
     Con el crédito que accedió en nuestra entidad logró adquirir una motocicleta que utiliza en su trabajo, además de realizar algunas mejoras en su vivienda.
   Con el crèdito adquirido comprarà animales
texts.en:
Mr. Carlos Ramón Báez is from the Calixtro district in the city of Carapeguá. He is married to Ms. Nancy Victoria Ayala. He buys and slaughters cattle, then sells the meat to butcher shops in the area for a living. He has been in business, from which he earns a living to support his family, for several years.

He currently has two underage children. He also has a house that he was able to build with all the amenities thanks to his sacrifice and dedication to his work.

With a loan that he obtained from our microfinance institute, he was able to purchase a motorcycle, which he now uses for work. He was also able to make some home improvements.

He will purchase cattle with this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase cattle

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El Sr.Daniel S. R. tiene 27 años de edad, vive en concubinato  con la Sra.Lilian Bogado,viven en el Barrio San Josè de Carapeguà y  tienen una hija de 3años de edad.
                   
                 Ambos desde muy jòven comenzaron a trabajar vendiendo remedios yuyos en el mercado de la ciudad de Asunciòn,viendo siempre buenos resultados y asi ivan  adquieriendo comodidades para  uso domèstico.

                  Gracias a su dedicaciòn al trabajo,lograron  construir para su casa  propia y contar con las  comodidades  bàsicas  para sobrevivvir.
 
                  Con el credito adquirido compraran coco .
texts.en:
Mr. Daniel R. S. is 27 years old and lives with his domestic partner, Ms. Lilian Bogado, in the San Josè de Carapeguà neighborhood. They have a 3-year-old daughter. They both started selling herbal remedies at a young age in the Asunciòn city market. Since they have always gotten great results, they have been able to pay for the household expenses. Thanks to their dedication to their work, they managed to build their own house, along with the basic amenities needed to survive. With this loan, they will purchase coconuts.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase coconuts

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Sr.Francisco Durè tiene 38 años de edad,está casado con la Sra.Mabel Espínola,viven en casa  propia en la ciudad de Carapeguà juntos tienen dos hijos en edad escolar.

             Se  conocieron desde  muy  jovenes  y se unieron  en pareja  intentaron  varias actividades para  poder salir adelante,  entre ellos vendieron  ropas y mas adelante  reunieron  un  pequeño capital y  pudieron dar  apertura a un  pequeño negocio en su domicilio ,.una pequeña despensa que  gracias a su  buena  ubicaciòn  y  buena  variedad de productos  consiguiò  muy buena clientela   

            Con el credito  obtenido comprarà  azucar ,arroz ,yerba
texts.en:
Francisco Durè is 38 years old, married with Mabel Espínola with whom he lives in a house he owns in the city of Carapeguà with their two school-aged children. They have known each other since they were very young and as a team have tried various businesses to better their situation. They have sold clothing and saved a small amount of money with which they opened a small business in their home: a small store which has drawn a good customer base because of its good location and variety of products for sale. He will use the loan to buy sugar, rice and herbs.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice and herbs

loans.name: Gabriella

texts.es:
Gabriela tiene apenas 20 años y vive en la ciudad de Acahay con sus padres.

         Gabriela está cursando el segundo año de la carrera de contabilidad en una de la universidades de la zona ,para poder solventar los   gastos de su estudio  hace dos años con la ayuda de sus padres  montaron  un pequeño negocio que consiste en  una librerìa   anexo venta  de celulares, su negocio  se encuentra ubicado en un  lugar estratègico  en frente mismo de un colegio  motivo  por el cual  tiene  una buena  cantidad de clientes y maneja un  buen  nivel de ventas a su corta edad  ya es  independiente  y paga sus  estudios  con el   producto de su sacrificio 

        Solicita el créditos para la compra de cuaderno ,boligrafos, mochilas
texts.en:
Gabriela is barely 20 years old and lives with her parents in the city of Acahay. Gabriela is in her second year of studying Accounting in one of the local universities. In order to pay her tuition, two years ago with her parents' help they open a small business: bookstore and cell phone sales. Her business is strategically located in front of the high school and therefore has a good number of customers. She is able to make a good number of sales and at her young age is financially independent and paying for her studies with the income she has earned through much sacrifice. She is asking for this loan in order to buy notebooks, pens and backpacks.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pens and backpacks

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra.María B. tiene 55años de edad,está casada con el Sr.Antonio González,juntos tienen 4 hijos, dos mayores de edad, una en edad escolar y otro es un chico especial.

                Hace 10 años que tiene su puesto de venta de comidadas  ràpidas  en la entrada de la ciudad de Carapeguá, donde la concurrencia de clientes  es mayor y existen  mas  posibilidades de venta  y aumentar  los  ingresos

Es una Sra.muy sacrificada que manifiesta que gracias a su trabajo  pudo solventar siempre los tratamientos de su hijo, que requiere de mucho cuidado.

               Con el crèdito adquirido comprara : maiz, queso ,grasa
texts.en:
María B. is 55 years old. She is married with Antonio González and together they have four children: two are adults, a school-aged daughter and a special-needs son. They have had a fast-food stall for 10 years, located at the entrance of the city of Carapeguá where there are a great number of clients and a greater possibility of making sales and increasing their profits. She is a very self-sacrificing woman who says that thanks to her work she has always been able to afford her son's treatments; he requires a lot of care. She will use the loan to buy corn, cheese and lard.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese and lard for her fast-food business

loans.name: Jhenny

texts.es: La señora Jenny H. se dedica a la venta de Dvd's y CD´S que compra al mayoréo en  El Desaguadero, Perú, productos que vende al por menor en las ciudades de Oruro y la feria 16 de Julio en El Alto, Bolivi. Su esposo para ayudarle con los gastos familiares trabaja de chofer asalariado, y esta jovén familia vive en la casa de sus padres a quienes ayudan en los gastos del hogar. Tienen un pequeño niño, ambos son muy  trabajadores y responsables con sus obligaciones, tanto con la familia como en el trabajo.
texts.en:
Jenny H. sells DVDs and CDs which she buys in bulk in El Desaguadero, Perú, products which she retails in the towns of Oruro and at the 16 of July festival in El Alto, Bolivia. Her husband is a salaried driver and helps with the household expenses. This young family lives in their parents' house whom they help by contributing to the household expenses. They have a young son; both are very hardworking and responsible both in their family life as in their professional life.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El Sr.Mario Luis T., tiene 19años de edad,es soltero,vive con sus padres en la compañìa de Tajy Loma.
.                   
                   Es un jòven muy emprendedor,que hace 2 años de dedica al macate ,,lleva mercaderias en la zona de Alberdi los dias sabado y domingo,y de lunes a viernes trabaja como ayudante en albañil.

	Con mucho  sacrificio  y  como  producto de  su esfuerzo  reuniò un  pequeño capital  y  pudo comprarse una  motocicleta  para  poder  llegar mas  facilmente  a mas  zonas y  conseguir mas clientes y atravez de ello aumentar sus ventas  

Con el crèdito  obtenido comprarà sobrecamas,frasadas ,hamacas
texts.en:
Mario Luis T. is 19 years old, single and lives with his parents in the neighbourhood of Tajy Loma. He is a very enterprising young man who two years ago opened a clothing store: he brings goods to Alberdi Saturdays and Sundays; from Monday to Friday he works as an assistant to a mason. With great sacrifice and much effort he was able to save a small amount of money and purchased a motorbike to travel more easily further afield and gain more clients in order to increase his sales. He will use the loan to buy bedspreads, blankets and hammocks.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy goods to retail:  bedspreads, blankets and hammocks

loans.name: Salustiana

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Salustina tiene 48 años de edad  es madre soltera con dos hijos uno ya mayor de edad  y otro en edad escolar.   

	 Esta señora es muy emprendedora, teje frazadas y manteles artesanales y ella misma se encarga de venderlos a cuotas en la localidad de Capiata en donde viaja cada mes a colocar y cobrar sus productos, gracias  a su trabajo y esfuerzo pudo brindarles a sus hijos todas las comodidades y a la vez hacerle estudiar. 

Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilos y color para tejer hamacas que en ésta temporada lo solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Salustina is 48 years old. She is a single mother with two children: one is of age and the other is still in school. This is a very enterprising woman: she weaves blankets and sells them herself in installments in Capiata where she travels every month to work and charge for her products. Thanks to her work and efforts she has been able to give her children all the comforts as well as pay their tuition. She is asking for this loan to buy thread and colour to weave hammocks which are in high demand at this time.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy raw materials to make bedspreads.

loans.name: Amador

texts.es: Amador tiene 23 años, vive con su esposa en su casa propia. Mejor mediante su fábrica de ladrillos trabaja constantemente desde hace 5 años para forjarse un futuro mejor. Comenzó siendo un simple jornalero, con el paso del tiempo, con sus ahorros y en sociedad con su hermano arrendaron un terreno arcilloso donde actualmente tienen su propia producción de ladrillos que venden en las ferias de  materiales de construcción que existen en su localidad. Así mismo ofrecen sus ladrillos a algunos constructores en particular. Para su futuro Amador quiere tener  un terreno propio para  obtener más ganancias, las dificultades que se presentan son cuando el clima lluvioso impide la rápida producción de los ladrillos, pero actualmente se ha provisto de gran cantidad de toldos de plástico para protegerse de las constantes lluvias. Es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y tiene muchas expectativas de un trabajo solidario en su banco comunal, donde quiere ser un integrante responsable. Es dinero que solicita es para comprar una camionada de aserrín, al cual cuesta 1300 soles, él dará pondrá la parte que falta de sus propios ahorros.
texts.en:
Amador is 23 years old and lives with his wife in a house they own. He's been constantly working in his brick factory for the past 5 years to build himself a better future. He started as a simple day laborer, but after some time, with their savings he and his brother financed the purchase of a plot of land that contains clay. They currently have their own brick production operation there, and they sell their bricks in construction material markets nearby. They also sell their bricks to particular builders. For his future, Amador wants his own plot of land to increase his income. He has difficulty producing bricks quickly during rainy weather, but he has recently acquired a large amount of plastic tarps to protect himself from the constant rains. This is the first time he asks for a loan with MFP, and he has high expectations of his solidarity to the communal bank, which he wants to join as a responsible member. The money he asks for is to purchase a truckload of sawdust, for a total of 1300 soles. He will pay for the remaining amount from his own savings.

Translated from Spanish by Esteban Riojas, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a truckload of sawdust

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Alfonso M., reside en Zacatecoluca departamento de La Paz, vive junto a su esposa desde ya hace 23 años en el mismo lugar. A sus 66 años de edad, se destaca por ser una persona muy trabajadora, ya que hace un año emprendió un negocio propio, el cuál consiste en vender materia prima para productos elaborados con madera. A pesar que Alfonso cuenta con una extensa red de clientes los cuales compran el producto al contado, no percibe  mucha ganancia debido a su poco inventario. Es por ello que el deseo de Alfonso es obtener un préstamo a través del cuál pueda aumentar sus productos y de esta manera incrementar sus ventas, así también desea mejorar las condiciones de su negocio, ya que los insectos deterioran la madera y le es muy necesario contar con el capital para mejorar su servicio. De esta manera el podrá percibir mayores ganancias y mejorar su economía familiar.
texts.en:
Alfonso M. and his wife have lived in the Zacatecoluca district of La Paz for 23 years. Although he is 66 years old, he continues to be a very hard worker, and it was only last year that he started his own business. He sells the raw materials needed to make other products out of wood. But although Alfonso has an extensive network of clients who pay cash for his products, he has not been able to make much of a profit because his inventory is so small. It is for this reason that Alfonso is requesting a loan. He would like to increase the range of products he offers and thus, increase his sales. A loan would also help him improve the condition of his store, which is currently infested with insects that are ruining his wood and are obviously a very serious problem for the quality of his service. In these ways, capital would help him improve the profitability of his business and increase his household's income.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy wood and improve inventory

loans.name: Alba Nelly

texts.es:
En el municipio de San Rafael de la ciudad de  Managua la señora Alba Hernandez se dedica con gran ahinco a su negocio de elaboración y venta de tortillas las cuales son hechas de maíz habiendo adquirido mucha experiencia en esta labora y hoy en día la lleva a cabo con el propósito de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

El proceso de trabajo de la señora Alba se lleva a cabo desde el momento en el que amanece el día, ella va a moler el maíz y comienza a elaborar las tortillas. Es de importancia destacar que actualmente ella ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra del maíz y de esta manera continuar con su negocio de venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
Living in San Rafael, in Managua city, Mrs. Alba Hernandez dedicates herself with great determination to her business: making and selling corn tortillas. She has a great deal of experience making tortillas and continues to work hard at it so that she can improve her quality of life. The process of making tortillas starts at dawn, when Mrs. Hernandez gets up to grind the corn she needs to make her tortillas. It is important to emphasize that she has come to Ceprodel to receive their help, that she would like a loan so that she can buy corn and continue selling her tortillas.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio tiene 21 años, vive con sus padres, en la casa de ellos. Se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos desde hace 5 años, empezó trabajando para otras personas como jornalero, fue donde adquirió toda la destreza y experiencia en el proceso de fabricación de ladrillos, por lo que tiempo después, junto a su hermano, decidieron arrendar un terreno arcilloso para emprender su propia fábrica, que hasta el momento está dando buenos resultados debido a la demanda de ladrillos en su localidad. Antonio está involucrado en el mismo proceso de la fabricación de los ladrillos y ha contratado nuevos jornaleros que le ayudan en esta labor, pero ahora quiere abastecerse de material para el comienzo del verano que será a mediados del mes de marzo a abril, donde las condiciones climáticas son favorables. Es la primera vez que Antonio tiene un préstamo con MFP, su deseo es trabajar por el bienestar de su banco comunal y ser puntual en sus pagos. El dinero que solicita será invertido en lo que haga falta para su fábrica, en esta ocasión, con una parte pagará a los jornaleros y con el resto del dinero comprará leña para el horno donde se realiza la cocción de los ladrillos. El pago que realiza sus jornaleros es de 80 soles por día y la lecha se compra por camionada valorizada en 500 soles.
texts.en:
Antonio is 21 years old and lives with his parents. He has dedicated himself to brick making for the last 5 years. At first, he worked for other people as a day labourer, gaining the dexterity and experience needed to make bricks. Then, he and his brother decided to rent a plot of land with good soil for making clay and begin their own brick factory. So far, they are doing very well, thanks to the high demand for bricks in their neighbourhood. Antonio involves himself in making the bricks and as well, he has hired some other labourers to help with the work. Now he would like to stock up on supplies for the start of summer - in march and april - when the climatic conditions are the best for brick making. This is the first loan Antonio will be receiving from MFP and he very much wants to work hard for the good of his communal bank, and intends to make his payments punctually. The money he is requesting will be invested into his factory. It will help pay the labourers' salaries and will be used to buy fuel for the brick baking oven. The labourers receive 80 soles a day and the fuel, bought by the truckload, costs 500 soles.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy fuel and pay labourers' salaries

loans.name: Angela Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Angela M. es una dama que se dedica a su negocio de venta de ropa, decoraciones, cosméticos y productos de belleza en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Ciudad Sandino donde atiende su negocio.

Es de importancia destacar que se ha desarrollado grandemente y por esta razón ha logrado salir adelante habiendo adquirido su vitrina para exhibir sus productos. Actualmente ella requiere de la compra de su mercadería y es por esta razón que ha acudido a Ceprodel esperando ser beneficiada con un crédito para dicha compra y así mejorar cada vez más las condiciones de su negocio.
texts.en:
Angela M. sells clothing, decorative items, cosmetics, and beauty products from a shop in her home in Ciudad Sandino.

It is important to note that Angela has progressed a lot, and for this reason she has been able to get ahead, having recently acquired a display case for her products. She currently needs assistance to purchase more merchandise, and so she has come to Kiva's partner CEPRODEL to request a loan to continue to develop her business.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Ana Mría vive en la Zona Villa Nueva Potosí, un barrio humilde de la ciudad de La Paz, Bolivia. Se dedica a la producción y comercialización de cuadernos, los mismos que vende en la calle La Tablada y también viaja a las ciudades de Potosí y Oruro donde tambien los comercializa, teniendo clientes fijos en todos los diferentes lugares. 
La Sra. Ana Maria C. Q. trabaja con la institución desde el 21 de Diciembre de 2007, su primer crédito fue con la necesidad de ampliar su negocio y sus ventas ya que el deber de hacer estudiar a sus cuatro hijos y sus ventas eran muy bajas ya que no tenía la capacidad de hacer grandes volúmenes de cuadernos. Su esposo se dedica a la misma actividad y de esta manera ambos colaboran en la producción de los cuadernos, lo que representa el único ingreso económico familiar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ana María C. Q. lives in Villa Nueva Potosí, in La Paz, Bolivia. She dedicates herself to the production and sale of notebooks. She sells them on La Tablada street and also travels to Potosí and Oruro, where she has many different distributors. Ana Maria has been a member of the communal bank since the December 21st, 2007. Her first loan gave her the capital she needed to expand her business while at the same time providing an education for her 4 children. Before the loan, her sales had been very low because she could not make very many notebooks at a time. Her husband also dedicates himself to making notebooks and works with Ana Maria in the family business which has become the family's only source of income.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy notebooks

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es: Ana Luz P. D. V., resiD. en el barrio Candelaria D. Zacatecoluca. Vive únicamente junto a su esposo, debido a que sus hijos son mayores D. edad y tienen su familia propia. A pesar que el esposo D. Ana Luz tiene un empleo formal, debido a su sueldo contribuye poco a su hogar, es por ello que Ana luz decidió crear su propio negocio, en el cuál venD. productos para el hogar, tales como electrodomésticos, camas, entre otros artículos. Es por ello que solícita un préstamo a través del cuál pueda aumentar la cantidad D. artículos para el hogar y tener más que ofrecer a sus clientes, D. manera que estos la prefieran y D. esta manera ella pueda aumentar sus ventas y contribuir junto a su esposo a la economía del hogar.
texts.en:
Ana Luz P. D. V. lives in the Candelaria neighborhood of Zacatecoluca. She and her husband live alone now that their children are all grown and have their own families. Although her husband is employed, his low salary prevents him from contributing very much towards maintaining their home. So, Ana Luz decided to start her own business. She sells appliances, beds, and other household items.

Ana Luz is requesting a loan in order to increase the number and variety of products she offers her customers. In this way, she will be able to increase her sales and contribute more to their household expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase appliances for her business

loans.name: Ursulina

texts.es:
Ursulina  tiene 43 años de edad, esta casada con el Sr. Emigdio S.  tienen 3 hijos  dos mayores de edad y una que esta cursando la secundaria, vive en la compañía Beni Loma de la ciudad de Carapegua.

	Desde temprana edad empezó a ayudar a su madre a confeccionar las colchas artesanales , de quién aprendió el oficio, hoy en día ella misma lleva a  vender sus productos en la zona de la capital del país con la ayuda de su marido, gracias a este trabajo logró construir una modesta casa y brindar buena atención a sus hijos.  	

Solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercaderías (hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas)
texts.en:
Ursulina is 43 years old. She is married to Emigdio S. and they have 3 grown up children, and one child who is still in secondary school. They live in Beni Loma in the city of Carapegua. From a young age, Ursulina helped her mother make speciality bed covers, learning the trade along the way. Now she sells her own products in the capital with help from her husband. Thanks to this work, they've been able to build a modest house and take good care of their children. With the loan, they will purchase needed merchandise such as blankets, sashes, sheets and hammocks.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise needed for their speciality bedspread business, such as blankets, sashes, sheets and hammocks.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es: Daysi tiene 32 años, vive con su madre y sus hermanos en L. casa propia D. sus padres. Se dedica a L. atención D. su tienda que instaló hace 10 años donD. elL. vive, comenzó con poca mercadería y desD. entonces no ha dejado D. trabajar en su propia fuente ingreso, que le ha permitido solventar su gastos durante años. Su horario es D. corrido, cada semana va al mercado mayorista para adquirir mercadería, anotando lo que hace falta para sus ventas. Lo que a Daysi le agrada D. su trabajo es el hecho D. estar en contactos con sus clientes, por lo que siempre da ese calor humano en L. atención que dispone. A fututo desea mejorar su tienda y ubicarL. en el centro D. L. ciudad o en una zona más comercial para hacer crecer su negocio. Es L. cuarta vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, elL. es una D. las socias que inculca entre los demás L. responsabilidad y L. asistencia puntual a las reuniones, se siente a gusto D. poder compartir un espacio D. su tiempo en las reuniones con sus compañeros. El dinero solicitado es para invertir en L. compra D. mercadería y para un nuevo negocio D. fotocopias que iniciará junto a su hermano, para eso Daysi utilizará L. mitad del préstamo en este proyecto D. negocio.
texts.en:
Daysi is 32 years old and lives with her brothers and her parents in her parents house. She works at a shop she set up ten years ago in the house. Starting with very little merchandise, she has continued to work to maintain her income, enabling her to cover her costs throughout the years. She runs a busy schedule, every week she goes to the wholesale markets to buy merchandise, keeping track of what she needs in her inventory. What Daysi appreciates about her work is that she gets to interact with all of her customers, providing good and friendly service to each one. In the future, she would like to expand her store and have a location in the center of the city, or in a zone which is more commercial so that she can grow her business. This is her 4th loan with MFP. As a member of the bank, Daysi is responsible, attends the meetings on time, and likes to be able to share time with other members of the bank. The money requested will be used to purchase merchandise for her store, and also for a new business in photocopying that she and her brother are starting. Daysi will use half the money for the new business.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her store, and help fund a new photocopying business as well.

loans.name: Estela De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
En el municipio de San Rafael del Sur la señora Estela de los Angeles se dedica con mucho esfuerzo a su negocio de venta de golosinas y en ocasiones venta de ropa con el propósito de mantener su núcleo familiar e ir mejorando las condiciones de su casa de habitación favoreciendo a sus pequeños hijos el cual requieren de su apoyo.

Se ha caracterizado por ser una excelente madre y excelente trabajadora que dedica el tiempo necesario a su trabajo para llevar el sustento a su hogar y mejorar las condiciones de su casa. La razón por la que espera en Ceprodel es para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita la compra de las golosinas y la ropa para seguirlas comercializando ya que se le han agotado y requiere de ellas para que  de esta manera continúe en el mejoramiento de sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
In the municipality of San Rafael south, Estela works very hard at her business selling sweets, and sometimes selling clothing as well, in order to help support her family, make improvements on their home, and continue to improve the quality of life for her young children.

She is an excellent mother and hard worker, dedicating the necessary time to her business so she can maintain her home. She works with Ceprodel so that she can receive a loan to purchase more sweets and clothing to sell, as she has used up her inventory. In this way she can continue to grow her business and improve the conditions for her family.


Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more sweets and clothing to sell

loans.name: Elia

texts.es: Elia tiene 23 años, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su propia casa. Se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos desde hace 2 años y tiene su propio horno. Ella conoce perfectamente cada proceso en la fabricación de los ladrillos porque desde niña trabajó en eso. Actualmente solo se dedica a administrar el negocio y a vender. Parte del día se ocupa de atender a sus pequeños hijos, mientras su esposo se dedica a la fabricación, pero también contratan personal para cubrir la producción de 20 millares cada 15 días. En estos últimos tiempos esta actividad se ha convertido en una fuente de ingresos económicos primordial para su familia. Elia y su esposo están planeando extender su fábrica adquiriendo nuevas extensiones de terreno arcilloso que son los adecuados para establecerse. Es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y tiene grandes deseos de trabajar de manera solidaria para el bienestar de cada uno de los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con el dinero que está solicitando invertirá en el pago de los peones que contratara para esta nueva temporada de fabricación, paga en promedio 300 soles por millar producido y a parte les da sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Elia is 23 years old and lives with her husband and four children in her own home. For the last two years she has sold bricks made in her own oven. She has been making bricks since she was very young and knows each step in their production intimately. Elia currently devotes her time to managing the business and selling the bricks. Part of each day Elia takes care of her children while her husband oversees production. They also employ workers to assist them in making 20,000 bricks every two weeks. Recently, this business has become the family's primary source of income. Elia and her husband are planning to acquire additional land in order to expand their production.

This is Elia's first loan from Kiva's partner Microfinanzas PRISMA, and she is committed to working towards the well-being of all of the members of her community bank. She will invest the loan in paying her employees. She pays them an average of 300 Peruvian nuevos soles (approximately US $92) for every thousand bricks, and also provides them with meals.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To pay workers at her brick factory

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es: Ana Rosa C. D. V., ResiD. en Zacatecoluca, junto a su hija, la cuál es madre soltera. Ambas deben trabajar arduamente para poder sostener su hogar y brindarle todas las necesidades básicas a su nieto. Ana Rosa posee su propio negocio, el cuál consiste en vender D. manera ambulante ropa en Zacatecoluca y Santiago Nonualco, así también por las tardes venD. en su propia casa, fruta, helados y charamuscas, las cuales son un tipo D. golosina típica D. El Salvador y son elaboran con jugos naturales los cuales se colocan en una pequeña bolsa plástica y se congela, ella logra vender muy bien este tipo D. golosinas, debido a que en los pueblos es costumbre que los niños coman frutas y charamuscas por las tardes. Ana Rosa solícita un préstamo a través del cuál obtenga el capital necesario para poder aumentar la cantidad D. ropa y poder elaborar más golosinas, y D. esta manera obtener mayores ganancias las cuales contribuyen al sostenimiento D. su hogar y así también a mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su pequeño nieto.
texts.en:
Ana Rosa C. D. V. lives with her daughter and her grandson in Zacatecoluca.Ana Rosa's daughter is a sinlge mother, and both women must work hard to support their home and to proviD. for the child. Ana Rosa sells clothing on the streets in Zacatecoluca and Santiago Nualco. In the afternoons, when she is back home, she sells fruit, ice cream and charamuscas (popsicles), which are maD. by freezing fruit juice in small plastic bags. Sales are good because children in the small towns are used to eat fruit and charamuscas in the afternoon. Ana Rosa is requesting a loan to purchase more clothing and more fruit to make charamuscas. With this loan she expects to produce more and obtain higher profits to support her home and to proviD. a better quality of life for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing clothing wholesale

loans.name: José Leopoldo

texts.es:
El negocio de panadería en todo momento requiere de inversión para llevar a cabo la elaboración del pan y así ofrecerlo a los clientes que lo demandan. En el municipio de Ciudad Sandino el señor José Leopoldo Gutierrez se dedica a su negocio de panadería donde todos los días elabora todo tipo de pan desde simple hasta dulce con el propósito de comercializarlo en su municipio.

Actualmente ha logrado mejorar sus ventas y acaparar más clientes y esto por la razón de que muy sabiamente ha acudido a Ceprodel para obtener créditos los cuales le han beneficiado en la compra de la materia prima para la elaboración del pan. Con el crédito que solicita actualmente se beneficia grandemente y beneficia su negocio ya que lo invertirá en el mejoramiento de su local con el propósito de brindarle mejores condiciones a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The business of a bakery in all moments requires an investment to carry out bread making and consequently offer the goods to clients who demand it. In the municipality of Sandino City Mr. José Leopoldo Gutierrez dedicates himself to his bakery business where every day he makes all types of bread, from simple to sweet, with the purpose of selling it all over his municipality. At present he has been able to improve his sales and garner more clients, and this because he has wisely turned to Ceprodel to obtain loans that have benefited him in the purchase of basic bread making materials. This loan that he is currently requesting benefits him and his business greatly given that he will invest it in the improvement of his business locale with the purpose of offering his clients better conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improvements to his bakery locale.

loans.name: Sabina Martha

texts.es:
La Sra. Sabina vive en la Zona Pura Pura de la ciudad de La Paz, un barrio muy pobre y humilde de la ciudad. Se dedica a la producción y comercialización de Ropa Deportiva (Busos), los mismos que vende en la el mercado matutino de la ciudad, este mercado consiste en la venta de productos artesanales a muy bajo precio y solamente se abre de hrs. 05:00 a 08:00 de la mañana, para ello doña Sabina cuanta con un puesto fijo. Los busos que produce son confeccionados en su domicilio. 
La Sra. Sabina Martha V. T. ingreso a trabajar con la institución desde el 10 de Septiembre de 2008, por la necesidad de tener un crédito para la compra de la materia prima para la producción y comercialización de las prendas que elabora, actividad que genera ingresos para su hogar, ingresos que sirven pra para hacer estudiar a sus dos hijos principalmente.  
Su esposo se dedica a la misma actividad y de esa manera ambos trabajan para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Sabina lives in the Pura Pura Zone of the city of La Paz, a very poor and humble neighborhood in the city. She dedicates herself to the production and sale of sportswear known as “busos”, which she sells in the city’s morning market. This market consists of handcrafted products for sale at very low prices and is only open between the hours of 5:00 and 8:00 in the morning; Sabina counts with a permanent stall in the market. The sportswear that she produces is made in her home. Mrs. Sabina Martha V. T. began working with the loan institution on the September 10th, 2008, due to her necessity to obtain a loan to purchase basic materials for the production and sale of the clothing that she makes. This activity is the means by which she generates her household income, an income that is principally used for her two children’s studies. Her husband dedicates himself to the same activity, and in this way they both work to support their family.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase basic materials for the production and sale of sportswear.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos R., reside en Zacatecoluca, junto a su esposa. Ambos son reconocidos como personas muy honradas y trabajadoras. A pesar de su avanzada edad el señor Carlos tiene un pequeño negocio en el cuál vende medicinas y las comercializa de manera ambulante tres veces a la semana, él deja al crédito los productos y los cobra en la siguiente visita. Tanto él como su esposa se mantiene de esta venta, es por ello que Carlos solícita un préstamo a través del cuál obtenga los recursos para poder aumentar la cantidad de medicinas y de esta manera brindar mayor variedad a las personas, con el fin de obtener mayores ganancias para lograr tener una mejor vida junto a su esposa, suplida de todas las necesidades básicas de un hogar.
texts.en:
Carlos R., resides in Zacatecoluca with his wife. Both are known as honest and hardworking people. Despite his advanced age Carlos has a small business in which he sells medicines; 3 days a week he delivers the medicines, leaves them on credit, and collects payment on the next visit. Carlos and his wife support themselves from these sales, and it is because of this that Carlos is requesting a loan through which he will obtain the resources to be able to increase the quantity of medicines and offer a better variety to people. His end goal is obtain higher earnings to be able to have a better life with his wife, supplied with all the basic necessities of a home.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more medicines for his business.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
El joven Virgilio tiene de 23 años de edad, es soltero vive en unas de las compañía (TajyLoma) de la ciudad de Carapeguá con sus padres. 

    	Como proviene de una familia humilde y con ganas de salir adelante y pensando en el futuro decidió viajar con su tío, ya que este se dedica a la ventas de artesanía en otras ciudades lo llevo con él como  repartidor de mercaderías
Mas adelante  con la  experiencia  adquirida  y  un poco de capital que  reuniò tomo el dasafiò de  intentar la misma  actividad por cuenta propia pero  buscando  una  nueva  zona de trabajo y realizo  su venta por la zona de   Ciudad del Este , actualmente ya cuenta con buena clientela formada. 
Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse una motocicleta  con  la cual   realizar su rrecorrido en forma  mas  ràpida  y eficiente 
	Solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercaderías (hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas) .
texts.en:
Virgilio is 23 years old, single, and lives in the city of Carapegua with his parents. In order to provide for his humble family and thinking about how to get ahead in the future, he decided to travel with his uncle who sells artisanal products in other cities. Virgilio went with his uncle to work delivering merchandise. Later, with the experience he acquired and a little bit of capital that he put together, Virgilio took up the challenge of starting his own independent business, but in a new area of work. He set up sales in the zone of Ciudad del Este and now has a good base of clients. Thanks to the effort and work, Virgilio was able to buy a motorcycle with which he can travel his delivery route in a faster and more efficient manner. He is seeking a loan to buy merchandise such as hammocks, blankets, sheets and belts.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kahn, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise such as sheets, blankets, hammocks and belts

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es: Fredy tiene 42 años, vive con su esposa e hijos. Tiene su tienda D. abarrotes que instaló en su misma casa hace 10 años, además que desD. joven se ha dedicado a L. agricultura, pero como tiene temporadas bajas desarrolló este negocio y L. crianza D. animales, los cuales le permiten tener un ingreso más estable para su familia. Junto a su esposa se reparten el horario D. atención D. L. bodega D. acuerdo a las tareas que tiene que realizar. Fredy trabaja fervientemente por L. mejora D. su negocio y ha planeado surtir su tienda con más mercadería, ya que actualmente es una D. las principales abastecedoras D. productos D. primera necesidad D. su localidad. Es L. segunda vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, él fue invitado a formar parte del banco comunal por su capacidad D. trabajo en equipo, además que promueve L. unidad D. sus integrantes. Del dinero que solicita, una parte (100 soles) L. invertirá netamente en implementar con mercadería su tienda y con el resto comprará un toro joven D. raza.
texts.en:
Fredy is 42 years old and lives with his wife and children. He has a grocery store that he installed in his own home 10 years ago. He has also dedicated himself to farming since he was young. However, since it has its low seasons, he developed this business as well as that of raising livestock, which permit him to earn a more stable income for his family. Together with his wife, they share the schedule of tending to the store depending on the other tasks they need to carry out. Fredy works tirelessly to improve his business, and has planned to supply his store with more merchandise since he is one of the primary providers of basic necessities in his locality. This is the second time he has a loan with MFP. He was invited to join the cooperative bank for his ability to work as a team, and also because he promotes unity among the members. Of the funds he is requesting, part (100 Peruvian soles) will be invested into stocking his store with merchandise. The rest, he will use to buy a young bull.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase his supply of merchandise, and to purchase a bull.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: El Sr. Julio es un cliente que trabaja con la institución desde el año 2006, Se dedica al transporte privado de taxi, para ello cuenta con 2 taxis uno lo maneja él y la otra movilidad la maneja un chofer contratado, los anteriores créditos que solicitó sirvieron para hacer el mantenimiento de sus movilidades, en esta ocasión el crédito lo utilizará en la construcción de un muro de contención para su casa, ya que por la temporada de lluvias que estamos cursando en el país existe el riesgo latente de los derrumbes, en especial en la zona en la que vive ya que es una ladera del cerro. Su esposa lo apoya con la venta de joyas por la zona y se ocupa de sus hijos, que están en edad escolar. Son una familia humilde pero muy trabajadora.
texts.en:
Julio is a client who has worked with the institution since the year 2006. He dedicates himself to providing private taxi transportation, for which he relies on two taxis. He drives one himself, and hires a second driver for the other. The previous loans he requested served to help maintain his vehicles. On this occasion, the loan would be used to build a retaining wall for his home since, during the rainy seasons we are experiencing in the country there exists the risk of collapses. This is particularly true in the zone in which he lives which is on a mountainside. His wife supports him through the sale of jewelry and by caring for their school-aged children. They are a humble, but very hard-working, family.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of a retaining wall.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es: Carolina A.
texts.en: Carolina A.

loans.use: To purchase more food products for her business.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es: Edith Días D. A., resiD. en el Cantón San Juan buena vista en Ahuachapán, vive junto a su esposo Elman A. D. 45 años D. edad cuya profesión es ser agricultor y con sus cuatro hijos menores D. edad. Edith D. 44 años ha trabajado durante 15 años en el negocio del maíz, el cuál consiste en cultivarlo y venderlo anualmente cuando la cosecha esta lista. El deseo D. Edith es el D. aumentar su capital D. trabajo D. manera que pueda invertir más en su negocio, todo esto con el fin D. poder mejorar los ingresos familiares y poder brindarles estudios a sus hijos y D. esta manera ofrecer un mejor futuros para ellos.
texts.en:
Edith Días D. A. lives in the San Juan Buena Vista district in Ahuachapán. She lives with her husband, Elman A., who is 45 years of age and a farmer, and their four young children. Edith is 44 years old and has worked for 15 years in the corn business, which consists of cultivating it and selling the annual harvest when it is ready. Edith’s wish is to increase her working capital to invest further in her business. All of this is toward the goal of improving the family’s income, and proviD. an education for her children so they can have brighter prospects for the future.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more corn for her business.

location.town: Cantón San Juan buena vista, Departamento de Ahuac

loans.name: Eduardo De Jesús

texts.es: Eduardo de Jesús M., reside en Zacatecoluca, junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos. Él no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, pero a pesar de esto Eduardo se esfuerza día con día para poder mantener a su familia y poder brindarles una vida mejor. Eduardo trabaja de manera ambulante vendiendo productos varias, tales como ajos, veneno para insectos, hisopos entre otras cosas más. Él realiza principalmente su trabajo en la plaza municipal que es donde logra percibir más ganancias. El Anhelo de Eduardo es poder obtener el dinero para invertirlo en su venta, de manera que pueda ofrecer mucho más y de esta manera percibir mayores ganancias para él y su familia, debido a que él es el único que provee a la economía del hogar, Eduardo solicita un préstamo por medio del cuál logre cubrir sus necesidades más básicas pero sobre todo las de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Eduardo de Jesús M. lives in Zacatecoluca with his wife and two children. He didn’t have the opportunity to study however, regardless, Eduardo works every day to support his family and provide them with a better life. Eduardo works as a traveling salesman of products such as garlic, insecticides, and cotton swabs, among other items. He realizes his work primarily at the municipal square, which is where he manages to make the most income. Eduardo’s wish is to obtain funds to invest in his business, so he can offer more products for sale. In this way, he could earn a greater amount of income for himself and his family, as he is the sole provider for the home. Eduardo requests a loan through which he can manage to provide for his most basic needs and, most of all, for the needs of his children.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the number of products for his business.

loans.name: Secondary School, Makeni Group

texts.en:
These people are teachers of a Secondary School in Makeni.  This Secondary School was established in 1962. It is one of the oldest schools in the city, and it is the only secondary school for girls in the whole city of Makeni. The school is made up of a junior secondary school and a senior secondary school. The junior school has about 800 pupils and the senior secondary school has about 500 pupils. Both the junior and senior secondary schools have 44 dedicated staff members.

This secondary school remains the first school of choice for girls in Makeni city and even beyond. The students of this school continue to make good grades in both the Basic Education Examination’s Certificate (BECE) for the Junior Secondary School and the West Africa Senior Secondary Schools Examination (WASSE). The school has contributed immensely towards the education of girls in Makeni and beyond. Many of the city’s educated women came from this school. This Secondary School also continues to triumph over other schools in terms of sports (such as volleyball and other athletics).

Augustine I. T. (second from left) is the leader of this group of teachers. Augustine is the school’s bursar and had been serving in this capacity for over ten years. Mr. Augustine was born in Makeni. He is 65 years old, married, and has 12 children, seven of whom are still attending school. Mr. Augustine will invest the loan into business. He has been in business for many years now. This loan will therefore boost his business and financial status. Consequently, he will be able to solve most of his domestic problems.

loans.use: Invest In business

loans.name: Las Salvadoras Group

texts.es:
Es un banco comunal compuesto D. 17 personas, el cual pertenece a la Localidad del km.9 a la ciudad D. Santa Cruz, la mayoría D. los clientes se dedican al comercio D. ropa, cosméticos, frutas y venta D. comidas.
GIOVANNA L. V..- es la líder del banco ella vive en el Km.9 en el barrio 4 D. marzo cuenta con casa propia. 
Su actividad principal es la venta D. cosméticos con lo que viene trabajado desD. hace aproximadamente tres años, es una persona muy responsable, le gusta trabajar con señoras para compartir sus experiencias y conocimientos.
LUZMILA BETHZABE Q..- es la secretaria del banco comunal. La actividad a la que se dedica es la venta D. comida venD. en su mismo domicilio hace unos tres años aproximadamente. Vive en la casa D. sus padres con su hijo y es madre soltera.
Su sueño es colocar en el Km.9 un restaurante propio, para así mejorar sus ingresos y poder darles una vida mejor a sus hijos ya que ellos se encuentran estudiando.  
CLAUDIA G. V..-  La Sra. Claudia es la Tesorera del banco comunal. Su actividad principal es la venta D. cosméticos por medio D. revistas (promotora), hace un año que viene trabajando con el mismo, y como segunda actividad tiene la D. la elaboración D. pan, es decir trabaja como ayudante en la cual su ganancias es en porcentajes.
Su meta es seguir trabajando, “el dinero que me fue desembolsado con este préstamo es el inicio una actividad mas”, comentó.
texts.en:
This is a community bank maD. up of 17 people, which is part of the locality known as "Km 9" near the city of Santa Cruz. The majority of the clients sell clothing, cosmetics, fruits and foods. GIOVANNA L. VIDUARRE is leader of the bank. She lives in Km 9, in the "4th of March" neighborhood and has her own house. Her main job is cosmetic sales. For about three years she has worked in this. She is a very responsible person. She likes working together with the women to share their experiences and knowledge. LUZMILA BETHZABE Q. is secretary of the community bank. She sells food. For about three years, she has worked from the same location. She lives in her parent’s house with her son and is a single mother. Her dream is to open her own restaurant in Km 9, in order to increase her income and to be able to give a better life to her children who are already studying. CLAUDIA G. VIDUARRE – Claudia is the treasurer of the community bank. Her main job is selling cosmetics through magazine ads. For one year, she has worked in this. Her second job is baking bread. She works as an apprentice so her earnings are in percentages. Her goal is to keep working. “The money that is paid out to me with this loan is the beginning of another job,” she said.

Translated from Spanish by Rebecca Towle, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase capital

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor Román R. desea poner techo en la parte de enfrente, con el anterior crédito ella mando que le construyeran las paredes y la esta utilizando como barda aun que le protege de la delincuencia su proyecto era una casa más grande. Ahora Leonor recurre aquí a pedir un préstamo, para poner su losa el cual tendrá que comprar material y pagar mano de obra. Su familia aun esta viviendo en un lugar muy incomodo ella piensa en el confort de y estabilidad de la misma.
El esposo es un señor que le gusta trabajar en taxi y con esto le ayuda a ella en los gastos familiares, donde trabaja Leonor es una maquiladora que no ganan mucho pero le sirve para estar pagando su casa y el préstamo.
texts.en:
Leonor Román R. wants to put a roof over the addition to her house that she is having built. With the previous loan that she received, she was able to pay for the construction of the walls. The walls act as a fence to guard her property against crime, but she wants to be able to use the additional space to live in. Now Loenor is asking for a loan to be able to lay tile in her addition and to be able to pay for labor. Her family is very uncomfortable living in a small space and she wants her family to be comfortable and stable. Her husband works as a taxi driver and his income helps her to support the family. Leonor works in a "maquiladora" (factory) where she does not make a lot, but her income helps her to pay for her house and her loan.

(Translated by Jasmine and Andrea of San Roque High School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase Building Materials

loans.name: Jhon

texts.es: Jhon tiene 24 años y vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Él se dedica a los bordados y a la atención de su pequeña tienda, la cual instalaron junto a su esposa hace medio año en su propia casa, como las ventas están con una demanda regular, le dedican mayor tiempo al   bordando de fustanes, negocio en el cual tiene muchos pedidos. Jhon aprendió a bordar de su esposa  y juntos realizan este trabajo  porque es rentable, los deseos de  Jhon es seguir adelante con esta actividad y a la vez mejorar  la mercadería de su tienda para mejorar  la entrada económica de su hogar. Es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y siente mucho entusiasmo por pertenecer a su banco comunal, además tiene muchos deseos de continuar adelante para el progreso de su grupo. Jhon esta solicitando un préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas para sus bordados  y en la implementación de su pequeña tienda de abarrotes para que las ventas  aumenten en la época escolar.
texts.en:
Jhon is 24 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children in his own house. He works making embroideries and tending to his small store that he started with his wife six months ago. They operate the store out of their home. Since the sales at the store are steady and not overwhelming, he dedicates most of his time to making the embroideries. He receives many orders for his embroideries. Jhon learned to embroider from his his wife and they would work together because selling the embroideries is profitable. Jhon wants to continues to move forward in life and provide for his family. He also wants to continue to improve the merchandise in his store and increase his income. This is the first time that Jhon is requesting a loan from MFP and he feels very enthusiastic about belonging to a communal bank. He is also very excited about helping his communal bank. Jhon is asking for a loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of fabrics for his embroideries and in investing in his small store so that his sales increase during the school year.

(Translated by Alex and Katey of San Roque High School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Materials for Embroidery

loans.name: Girasoles Group

texts.es:
Es un banco comunal compuesto por 15 personas, todos viven en el Km: 9 a la ciudad D. Santa Cruz, Bolivia. Su actividad económica es la venta D. ropa, comida y cosméticos. Y el destino del crédito será para aumentar su capital.
RAQUEL M..- Es la líder del banco, es una mujer con muchas ganas D. superación su actividad principal es la venta D. comida ella esta empezando a trabajar con Emprender su objetivo es seguir trabajando mucho tiempo mas para que D. esta manera poder seguir creciendo económicamente.
FRANCISCA M..- es la secretaria del banco comunal, se dedica a la venta D.  pan vive en casa D. sus padres, su objetivo es contar con su propia panadería, para D. esta manera  poder ayudar su familia y también seguir estudiando.
FREDDY S. C..-  El sr. Freddy es el tesorero del banco comunal, vive en casa familiar en el Barrio 23 D. diciembre del km. 9.
D. igual  manera que los mencionados anteriormente, se dedican a la actividad D. panadería, en la cual trabaja junto a toda su familia.
Es un cliente que tiene muchas ganas trabajar, su fin u objetivo con el préstamo que le fue otorgado es agrandar mucho mas su capital D. trabajo,
texts.en:
The community bank is maD. up of 15 people who all live in the Km:9 zone of the city of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. They work selling clothing, food and cosmetics. The loan will be used to increase their capital. Raquel M. is the leader of the bank, and is a woman who really wants to build a better life. Her main economic activity is selling food. She is just starting to work with the Emprender organization. Her objective is to continue working for a long time to come, and in this way continue growing her income. Francisca M. is the secretary of the community bank, and works selling bread. She lives in her parents' home, and her goal is to own her own bakery so that she can help her family and also continue to study. Freddy S. C. is the treasurer of the community bank. He lives in his family home in the 23 D. Diciembre neighborhood of Km:9. Similar to those mentioned above, he works in the bakery business, together with the rest of his family. He is very keen to work, and his objective with this loan is to build up more working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Sally Bolton, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mila

texts.es: Mila tiene 18 años, vive con su esposo y su hijo en casa de sus suegros. Ella se dedica a apoyar a su esposo en las tareas de fabricación de ladrillos, su trabajo consiste  en estar en cada proceso de su elaboración, lo cual toma casi todo el día, dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 1 año atrás; su esposo es el que más se esfuerza en estas tareas y ella lo apoya en todo porque quiere en un futuro puedan tener un terreno propio, para tener su  propia fábrica de ladrillos, ya que el alquiler del terreno causa un gasto adicional. Además de su trabajo Mila se da tiempo para cuidar a su pequeño hijo, y actualmente ha optado por criar animales para luego venderlos, esto la ayuda a solventar los gastos de su hogar en momentos de escasez, lo cual se da generalmente en épocas de lluvia intensa. Es la primera vez que Mila tiene un préstamo con MFP, comprometiéndose a ser puntual y muy responsable en los pagos. Solicita esta cantidad para invertirla en la compra de dos cerdos pequeños, los cuales están valorizados en 400 soles y con el dinero que resta comprará plásticos para  proteger los ladrillos recién elaborados.
texts.en:
Mila is 18 years old and lives with her husband and son in her mother and father-in-law's home. She works by helping her husband make bricks. Her work consists of being there for each step of the process which takes all day. She's been helping her husband to make bricks. Her work consists of being there for each step of the process which takes all day. She has been helping her husband for one year. Her husband is the one who works the hardest and she helps him with everything because she wants them to be able to buy a piece of land. They want to be able to have their own land so that they can have their own Brick factory and not have to pay rent on the land. Besides her work making bricks, Mila also cares for her small child. In addition, she raises animals to sell. Doing so helps her to pay for her family's expenses, especially in times when they experience a shortage of money, which usually happens when it rains a lot. This is the first time that Mila is requesting a loan from MFP. She promises to make her payments on time and to be very responsible. She is requesting this loan amount to be able to invest it in the purchase of two small pigs, which cost 400 Soles and with the rest of the money she will purchase plastic coverings to protect the bricks after they have been made.

(Translated by Ashlee of San Roque High School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of two small pigs to raise and sell and plastic coverings to protect the bricks after they have been made.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
La Sra. Cecilia Solíz, vive en la urbanización Balcón II, en el departamento de Santa Cruz, Bolivia, estudia Ingeniería Petrolera en la universidad, paralelamente cuenta con un negocio de alquiler de sillas, mesas, vajilla y de equipo de sonido para eventos especiales.
Es una  señorita soltera e independiente, con mucha ganas de superación.
El destino del credito será para aumentar su capital de trabajo, y así poder seguir solventando sus estudios, que son demasiados caros.
texts.en:
Mrs. Cecilia S. lives in the housing projects of Balcon II in the state of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. She studies Petroleum Engineering at the university and she also has a rental business. She rents chairs, tables, tableware and sound equipment for special events. Cecilia is a single and independent woman with a great desire to get ahead in life. The loan money will be used to increase her work capital and in that way continue paying for her studies, which are very expensive.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy chairs for rental business

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam tiene 20 años y vive en casa de su mamá. Ella tiene el don del canto, su voz melodiosa ha captado la atención de personas que la propusieron  a dedicarse netamente a ello, es así que formalmente hace 4 años ella incursionó en cantar música vernácular, la cual es la música típica de su tierra; ella recibe contratos para cantar en eventos musicales de su zona y con ese talento que posee, produjo un CD con canciones que ella misma compuso, Miriam tiene grandes sueños y anhelos de ser una cantante reconocida en su medio y le pone mucho esfuerzo en lo que hace, mientras tanto seguirá trabajando para lograr este gran sueño y poder solventar su producción musical, además del canto se dedica tambíen a trabajar comercializando mercerías en las ferias comerciales de su localidad. Es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y está decidida a trabajar como una integrante más en su banco comunal. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de un nuevo vestuario, ya que la imagen tiene mucho que ver para la buena aceptación del público y hacer que sus presentaciones logren mayor éxito; su traje está valorizado en 1000 soles porque tiene aplicaciones de bordados y otros detalles finos.
texts.en:
Miriam is 20 years old and lives in her mother’s house. She has a gift for singing and her melodious voice has captured the attention of many people who encouraged her to pursue singing. Four years ago she began singing formally—she performs popular folk music, the typical music of her home. She has contracts to sing at music events in the region and because of her talent, she produced a CD with songs that she composed. Miriam dreams of being a well-known singer and she puts a lot of effort into what she does. She is working hard to achieve her goal and support her music production. In addition to singing she also sells small items at the markets in her town. This is her first loan with MFP and she has decided to become a member of her community bank. The loan money will go towards the purchase of a new dress, since the public’s acceptance has a lot to do with the image she puts forth. The dress is valued at 1,000 soles because it has embroidery and other intricate details.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a new dress for performances

loans.name: Rosa
